description: The BR-39 District Transport Office (DTO) serves the Katihar district within the Purnia division of Bihar, a strategic region near the West Bengal border. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act across its vast jurisdiction comprising 15 blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Compound, Mirchaibari, Katihar, Bihar
